room_title: Escape room "Jungala" by Escape Reality in Las Vegas
review: We had the chance to do Jungala. I've been to other escape rooms, and I have to say that this one was the most fun so far! Super clean, staff is awesome, helpful, and nice. They make the experience fun for anyone who comes in from the beginning. We can't wait to go to more!

room_title: Escape room "Jungala" by Escape Reality in Las Vegas
review: Our first time in an escape room! We did the Jungala room and nearly escaped! Acel, our guide, was fun and very friendly. They give local discounts and it was close to our home. We will be back soon!

room_title: Escape room "Jungala" by Escape Reality in Las Vegas
review: Had a lot of fun here with my friends. We did the Jungala room and it was a great time! I definitely recommend this for anyone looking for a fun thing to with friends and family!

room_title: Escape room "Jungala" by Escape Reality in Las Vegas
review: This was so much fun for our group of first-timers! Casey was our guide, and she was AMAZING! She gave us just the right amount of information to get us started, and when we needed assistance, she was SO encouraging about our progress and giving us just a 'little' hint to keep us moving along.We did the Jungala Room, and we just barely made it out before the time was up. Escape Reality exceeded our expectations!

room_title: Escape room "Jungala" by Escape Reality in Las Vegas
review: Super fun and fairly difficult. We did the jungle themed escape room and had to use the hints twice but the rest of the clues were engaging and fun to figure out!
